relay.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a piece of electrical equipment that receives radio or television signals and sends them on
relay.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to pass a message from one person or place to another
relay.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: He quickly relayed this news to the other members of staff.
relay.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: if radio or television signals are relayed, they are received and sent, especially so that they can be heard on the radio or seen on television
relay.translation[1].definitions[1].exam: The broadcasts were relayed by satellite.
relay.translation[2].definitions[0].defi: to lay something on the ground again because it was not done well enough before
relay.translation[2].definitions[0].exam: The carpet will have to be relaid.
